subject: vinegar-based hot sauce
body:
1\. it was fine that i didn't finish my project before the end of the sprint and i made a lot of really good progress yesterday that made me happy. i let myself get so stressed about deadlines and priorities that for a minute i forgot about the fun of building it but i found the fun again. almost all the big pieces are in place and i get to add the small sweet touches (what we call "delighters").

2\. cooking our hot dogs in the air fryer (5 minutes at 400) then taking them out and putting them in their buns with american cheese underneath them and putting the assembled dogs back in for another 2 minutes to toast the buns and melt the cheese. toppings for me are beanless chili from a can, finely diced raw onions, a streak of mustard, and vinegar-based hot sauce.

3\. really good watermelon. haribo gummy bears. my screen time is currently down 17% from last week (i've lost almost all interest in threads—i scroll it once or twice a day and despite a lot of muting and blocking rarely find things that interest me or compel me to return). i started rereading _the fifth season__._
